Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Class CustomErrorImpl

java.lang.Object
lanat.parsing.errors.CustomErrorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Error<ParseErrorContext>, Error.CustomError, Error.ParseError, ErrorLevelProvider
public class CustomErrorImpl extends Object implements Error.CustomError
Implements the basic behavior of a custom error.

    • getErrorLevel

      @NotNull public @NotNull ErrorLevel getErrorLevel()
      Description copied from interface: Error
      Returns the error level of the error. This is used to determine whether the error should be displayed to the user, depending on the error level set in the configuration of the commands.
      By default, this method returns ErrorLevel.ERROR.
      Specified by:
      getErrorLevel in interface Error<ParseErrorContext>
      Specified by:
      getErrorLevel in interface ErrorLevelProvider
      Returns:
      The error level of the error.
